reviewText: This movie has a good moral ending. Derek (British Filipino) has teamed up again with Anne Curtis and wow, they hit it off big time on the screen. This movie has its raunchy moments but when you think about it, it reflects what happens in reality. (Temptations, the thrills and then the consequences.) This was my first Filipino movie and I have to say, I liked it a great deal. I am watching another movie called 'No other woman' and it teaches major lessons for all of us married folk. The thrill and excitement is not worth it in the long run...
